hudmanager.configuration.title: HUD Manager Configs
The action bar is just above the hotbar, where various texts can be displayed.
hudmanager.configuration.AutoSaveIndicat: The autosave indicator is in the bottom right of screen, which says "Saving World" when autosaving.
hudmanager.configuration.BossBarScale.to: The boss bar is at the top of screen, which tracks health of boss or raid mobs.
hudmanager.configuration.ClosedCaptionSc: The closed caption is in the bottom right of screen, which displays text for sounds in-game.
The crosshair is in the middle of screen, which exactly shows the aim point.
hudmanager.configuration.DebugScreenScal: The debug screen is displayed when F3 is pressed, which displays various useful information.
hudmanager.configuration.PlayerListScale: The player list is displayed while holding down Tab, which displays various information of players.
hudmanager.configuration.ScoreboardSideb: The Scoreboard Sidebar is on the right of screen, which displays information of 'objective'.
hudmanager.configuration.ScreenTitleScal: The screen title is in the middle of screen, where various texts can be displayed.
hudmanager.configuration.StatusEffectSca: The status effects are displayed on the top right of screen, which can be taken from potions, foods, etc.
